SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.CATE_NO, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_WRITER, B.BOARD_PW, B.BOARD_REGDATE, B.BOARD_CNT, COUNT(F.FILE_NO) FILE_NO_CNT, U.USER_ROLE FROM T_SB_BOARD B LEFT OUTER JOIN T_SB_FILE F ON B.BOARD_NO = F.BOARD_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN T_SB_USER U ON B.BOARD_WRITER = U.USER_ID
WHERE 1 = 0 OR BOARD_TITLE REGEXP CONCAT('.*', REPLACE(#{boardSearch.searchKeyword}, ' ', '.*'), '.*') OR BOARD_CONTENT REGEXP CONCAT('.*', REPLACE(#{boardSearch.searchKeyword}, ' ', '.*'), '.*') OR BOARD_WRITER REGEXP CONCAT('.*', REPLACE(#{boardSearch.searchKeyword}, ' ', '.*'), '.*')
WHERE 1 = 1
AND BOARD_TITLE REGEXP CONCAT('.*', REPLACE(#{boardSearch.searchKeyword}, ' ', '.*'), '.*')
AND BOARD_CONTENT REGEXP CONCAT('.*', REPLACE(#{boardSearch.searchKeyword}, ' ', '.*'), '.*')
AND BOARD_WRITER REGEXP CONCAT('.*', REPLACE(#{boardSearch.searchKeyword}, ' ', '.*'), '.*')
GROUP BY B.BOARD_NO ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO DESC

AND BOARD_CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{boardSearch.searchKeyword}, '%')
AND BOARD_WRITER LIKE CONCAT('%', #{boardSearch.searchKeyword}, '%')
GROUP BY B.BOARD_NO ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO
